mapper.select: select b.no, b.name, b.engname, decode(s.member_no, #{memNo}, 1, 0) as subsed from brand b left outer join subs s on b.no = s.brand_no

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.thumbnail, p.views, p.zzimcount, p.brand_no as brandNo, b.categorybrand_no as mainCategory, p.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo, q.qtysum, b.engname from brand b join product p on b.no = p.brand_no join (select product_no, sum(qty) as qtysum from orderedproduct group by product_no order by sum(qty) desc) q on p.no = q.product_no) A ) B where rnum between 1 and 4

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.thumbnail, p.views, p.zzimcount, p.brand_no as brandNo, b.categorybrand_no as mainCategory, p.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo, b.engname from brand b join product p on b.no = p.brand_no order by no desc) A ) B where rnum between 1 and 4

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.thumbnail, p.views, p.zzimcount, p.brand_no as brandNo, b.categorybrand_no as mainCategory, p.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo, q.qtysum, b.engname from brand b join product p on b.no = p.brand_no join (select product_no, sum(qty) as qtysum from orderedproduct group by product_no order by sum(qty) desc) q on p.no = q.product_no where b.no in (select brand_no from subs where member_no = #{memNo}) ) A ) B where rnum between 1 and 4

select B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.thumbnail, p.views, p.zzimcount, p.brand_no as brandNo, b.categorybrand_no as mainCategory, p.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo, b.engname from brand b join product p on b.no = p.brand_no where b.no in (select brand_no from subs where member_no = #{memNo}) order by no desc) A ) B where rnum between 1 and 4
select b.no, b.name, b.engname from subs s join brand b on s.brand_no = b.no where member_no = #{memNo}

select b.no, b.name, b.engname from brand b left outer join (select b.no as brandno, b.name, b.engname from subs s join brand b on s.brand_no = b.no where member_no = #{memNo}) subsed on b.no = subsed.brandno where subsed.brandno is null
SELECT b.no, b.name, b.engname, bn.title, bn.uploaddate, bn.content FROM BRANDNEWS bn JOIN BRAND b ON bn.brand_no = b.no
select * from product where name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
